verses.verse: This <WH2088> is the book <WH5612> of the generations <WH8435> of Adam. <WH121> In the day <WH3117> that God <WH430> created <WH1254> man, <WH120> in the likeness <WH1823> of God <WH430> made <WH6213> he him;

Male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> created <WH1254> he them; and blessed <WH1288> them, and called <WH7121> <WH853> their name <WH8034> Adam, <WH121> in the day <WH3117> when they were created. <WH1254>

And Adam <WH121> lived <WH2421> a hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> a son in his own likeness, <WH1823> after his image; <WH6754> and called <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Seth: <WH8352>

And the days <WH3117> of Adam <WH121> after <WH310> he had begotten <WH3205> <WH853> Seth <WH8352> were <WH1961> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> years: <WH8141> and he begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> that <WH834> Adam <WH121> lived <WH2425> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Seth <WH8352> lived <WH2421> a hundred <WH3967> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Enos: <WH583>

And Seth <WH8352> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Enos <WH583> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and seven <WH7651> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Seth <WH8352> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Enos <WH583> lived <WH2421> ninety <WH8673> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Cainan: <WH7018>

And Enos <WH583> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Cainan <WH7018> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Enos <WH583> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and five <WH2568> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Cainan <WH7018> lived <WH2421> seventy <WH7657> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Mahalaleel: <WH4111>

And Cainan <WH7018> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Mahalaleel <WH4111> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and forty <WH705> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Cainan <WH7018> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Mahalaleel <WH4111> lived <WH2421> sixty <WH8346> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Jared: <WH3382>

And Mahalaleel <WH4111> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Jared <WH3382> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Mahalaleel <WH4111> were <WH1961> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> ninety <WH8673> and five <WH2568> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Jared <WH3382> lived <WH2421> a hundred <WH3967> sixty <WH8346> and two <WH8147> years, <WH8141> and he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Enoch: <WH2585>
And Jared <WH3382> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Enoch <WH2585> eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Jared <WH3382> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> sixty <WH8346> and two <WH8147> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Enoch <WH2585> lived <WH2421> sixty <WH8346> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Methuselah: <WH4968>

And Enoch <WH2585> walked <WH1980> with <WH854> God <WH430> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Methuselah <WH4968> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Enoch <WH2585> were <WH1961> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> sixty <WH8346> and five <WH2568> years: <WH8141>
And Enoch <WH2585> walked <WH1980> with <WH854> God: <WH430> and he was not; <WH369> for <WH3588> God <WH430> took <WH3947> him.
And Methuselah <WH4968> lived <WH2421> a hundred <WH3967> eighty <WH8084> and seven <WH7651> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> <WH853> Lamech: <WH3929>

And Methuselah <WH4968> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Lamech <WH3929> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> eighty <WH8084> and two <WH8147> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Methuselah <WH4968> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> sixty <WH8346> and nine <WH8672> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Lamech <WH3929> lived <WH2421> a hundred <WH3967> eighty <WH8084> and two <WH8147> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> a son: <WH1121>

And he called <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Noah, <WH5146> saying, <WH559> This <WH2088> same shall comfort <WH5162> us concerning our work <WH4480> <WH4639> and toil <WH4480> <WH6093> of our hands, <WH3027> because of <WH4480> the ground <WH127> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath cursed. <WH779>

And Lamech <WH3929> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> he begot <WH3205> <WH853> Noah <WH5146> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> ninety <WH8673> and five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> and begot <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters: <WH1323>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Lamech <WH3929> were <WH1961> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> seventy <WH7657> and seven <WH7651> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
And Noah <WH5146> was <WH1961> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old: <WH1121> and Noah <WH5146> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Shem, <WH8035> <WH853> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315>
